===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ひかり}}
The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|光る|tr=hikaru||to shine, to glitter, to gleam}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|ひかり|acc=3|acc_ref=NHK,DJR|dev=1}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|光り}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ひかり}}

# a [[physically]] [[perceived]] [[light]]: a [[light]], a [[gleam]], [[shining]], [[glittering]]
#: {{ja-usex|ダイヤモンドの'''光'''|ダイヤモンド の '''ひかり'''|a diamond's '''glitter''' / '''shine''' / '''twinkling'''}}
# a [[metaphorical]] light: [[glory]], a [[glimmer]], a [[gleam]]
#: {{ja-usex|前途に'''光'''を失う|ぜんと に '''ひかり''' を うしなう|to lose '''light''' regarding the future → future prospects grow dim}}
#: {{ja-usex|解決への道に'''光'''を投げかける|かいけつ へ の みち に '''ひかり''' を なげかける|to shed '''light''' on the way to a solution}}
# {{qualifier|in compounds}} [[optics]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''光'''ファイバー|'''ひかり''' ファイバー|'''optical''' fiber}}
